items.name: 3.7 Pack (Citra Version)
items.desc:
Citra single-hopped Pale Ale.
Packed full Citra,
Cryo and Crop Year 2019.
Packing stacks of packs.
ALC 3.7% VOL 440ML
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: A Path Untravelled
items.desc:
A 30g/L Citra & NZ Cascade TIPA.
Old world meets new world in the most modern of beer styles. Deeply intense yet silky smooth, this triple IPA was fermented with a blend of traditional English Ale yeast, packed full of pungent stone fruit esters, and a modern New England strain known to bring the juice. The two come together in an exceptionally harmonious union.
10% ABV 440ML
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: All The Legs 3 Pack
items.desc:
If you would like to taste all of the three versions of this IPA. then this is the right pack for you. We brewed two batches of this IPA that's hopped with Motueka, Loral and Chinook which was then fermented using two different yeast strains. Make sure to let us know your feedback, we would love to hear from you!
The pack includes:
1 x 440ml can of Right Leg, 6% IPA Fermented with a modern New England yeast strain.
1 x 440ml can of Left Leg, 6% IPA Fermented with traditional English Ale yeast.
1 x 440ml can of Both Legs Together, 6% IPA Fermented with a blend of modern and traditional yeast strains.
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS
**THIS PACK IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR DISCOUNTS AS IT'S ALREADY DISCOUNTED**

items.name: Black Is Beautiful
items.desc:
Spiced Imperial Stout made in collaboration with Rock Leopard.
This Imperial Stout is our contribution to the Black Is Beautiful initiative hosted by Weathered Souls Brewing Co and has been brewed with our friends from Rock Leopard.
It's built on the rich, decadent base from My Continuous Improvement with a complex spice profile that includes African cinchona bark, orange peel, cloves, cinnamon sticks, dandelion root, kaffir lime leaves, cardamom pods, tonka beans, birch leaves, star anise and caraway seeds.
The Black is Beautiful initiative is a collaborative effort amongst the brewing community and its customers, in an attempt to bring awareness to the injustices that many people of colour face daily. Its mission is to bridge the gap that's been around for ages and provide a platform to show that the brewing community is an inclusive place for everyone of any colour.
100% of all proceeds (not just profits) from this beer have been donated to three organisations fighting the injustices, crimes, hostility and brutality facing Black people in our country. These organisations are Kids Of Colour, Rainbow Noir, and The Racial Justice Network.
Due to this, this beer is not applicable for any discounts or promotional campaigns we are currently running on our website (this includes the NHS and Key Worker discounts).
11% ABV, 440ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Both Legs Together
items.desc:
An IPA hopped with Motueka, Loral and Chinook, Fermented with a blend of modern and traditional yeast strains.
ALC 6.0% VOL 440ML
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Eating Habits 3 Pack
items.desc:
A three part showcase series of crop year 2019 hops. Enjoy them on its own, compare it to its compatriots, or blend it to build your own creation. Each beer uses a neutral yeast to give the hops space to shine with each version presenting different hop combinations.
The pack includes:
1 x 440ml can of Eating To Live, 4.0% Pale Ale. A classic combo makes its comeback in this showcase of crop year 2019 hops. The first in the three-part series. This version features the classic West Coast combination of Centennial and Columbus.
1 x 440ml can of Living To Eat, 4.0% Pale Ale. Two pillars of modern beer stand tall in this showcase of crop year 2019 hops. The second in the three-part series. This version features those modern mainstays Mosaic and Simcoe.
1 x 440ml can of Living To Endlessly Chew Food, 4.0% Pale Ale. Two notable newcomers demand attention in this showcase of crop year 2019 hops. The third in the three-part series. This version features two new varietals that have quickly made their mark, Idaho 7 and Strata.
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS
**THIS PACK IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR DISCOUNTS AS IT'S ALREADY DISCOUNTED**

items.name: Eating to Live
items.desc:
A classic combo makes its comeback in this showcase of crop year 2019 hops. The first in the three-part series.
Enjoy it on its own, compare it to its compatriots, or blend it to build your own creation. This Pale Ale is one in a three-part series designed to showcase the full breadth of our hand-selected Crop Year 2019 hops. Each beer uses a neutral yeast to give the hops space to shine and this version features the classic West Coast combination of Centennial and Columbus.
ALC 4.0% VOL 440ML
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Imperial Stout 4 Pack
items.desc:
This 4 pack of beer includes 2 of our most ambitious and biggest stout releases of late.
2 x Persistence Is Utile: Bitter Chocolate Edition, 12% - Take a long moment to experience our fruit-forward coffee Imperial Stout, infused with Kenyan Muchagara from our friends at Workshop Coffee and a double dose of rich, bitter chocolate, backed up by smooth vanilla. These are tough times and you deserve both a treat and a pick-me-up in. (440ml)
2 x Black Is Beautiful, 10% - Spiced Imperial Stout made in collaboration with Rock Leopard. This Imperial Stout is our contribution to the Black Is Beautiful initiative hosted by Weathered Souls Brewing Co and has been brewed with our friends from Rock Leopard. It's built on the rich, decadent base from My Continuous Improvement with a complex spice profile that includes African cinchona bark, orange peel, cloves, cinnamon sticks, dandelion root, kaffir lime leaves, cardamom pods, tonka beans, birch leaves, star anise and caraway seeds. The Black is Beautiful initiative is a collaborative effort amongst the brewing community and its customers, in an attempt to bring awareness to the injustices that many people of colour face daily. Its mission is to bridge the gap that's been around for ages and provide a platform to show that the brewing community is an inclusive place for everyone of any colour. 100% of all proceeds (not just profits) from this beer have been donated to three organisations fighting the injustices, crimes, hostility and brutality facing Black people in our country. These organisations are Kids Of Colour, Rainbow Noir, and The Racial Justice Network. (440ml)
**THIS PACK IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR DISCOUNTS AS IT'S ALREADY DISCOUNTED**

items.name: Light Lager 6 Pack
items.desc:
Effortlessly drinkable, refined refreshment.
Our Light Lager is brewed with a small proportion of rice to lighten the colour, flavour, and body, leaving you with a refined beer that’s easy drinking. Perfect for times that require maximum refreshment or considered moderation.
3.5% ABV 440ml x 6
Aroma & Flavour: Backbone of subtle malt sweetness and a light lemony hop character, rounded off by a touch of herbal bitterness
Body: Light-bodied, crisp and dry
Aftertaste: Lasting notes of sweet grain alongside faint herbal hop notes
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY RICE
**THIS PACK IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR DISCOUNTS AS IT'S ALREADY DISCOUNTED**

items.name: Living To Eat
items.desc:
Two pillars of modern beer stand tall in this showcase of crop year 2019 hops. The second in the three-part series.
Enjoy it on its own, compare it to its compatriots, or blend it to build your own creation. This Pale Ale is one in a three-part series designed to showcase the full breadth of our hand-selected Crop Year 2019 hops. Each beer uses a neutral yeast to give the hops space to shine and this version features those modern mainstays Mosaic and Simcoe.
ALC 4.0% VOL 440ML
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.desc:

Enjoy it on its own, compare it to its compatriots, or blend it to build your own creation. This Pale Ale is one in a three-part series designed to showcase the full breadth of our hand-selected Crop Year 2019 hops. Each beer uses a neutral yeast to give the hops space to shine and this version features two new varietals that have quickly made their mark, Idaho 7 and Strata.
ALC 4.0% VOL 440ML

items.name: Other People Are Not Me
items.desc:
A foudre beer with native chuckleberries.
The origins of this beer lead us back to our 2017 collaboration with De Garde, a masterful brewery in Tillamook, OR devoted to spontaneous beers. Their house culture, after 30 months and two light refermentations in foudre, leaves its mark under a four-month long 500g/l refermentation on native chuckleberries.
ALC 5.4% VOL 750ML
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Outside Looking In
items.desc:
This Double IPA featuring Citra, Galaxy and Pacific Jade, is certainly not backward in coming forward, combining tangerine and tropical punch flavours with punchy resinous notes.
8% ABV 440ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OAT

items.name: Persistence Is Utile: Bitter Chocolate Edition
items.summary: Imperial Stout w/ Cacao, Vanilla & Coffee
items.desc:
Take a long moment to experience our fruit-forward coffee Imperial Stout, infused with Kenyan Muchagara from our friends at Workshop Coffee and a double dose of rich, bitter chocolate, backed up by smooth vanilla. These are tough times and you deserve both a treat and a pick-me-up in one.
12% ABV 440ML
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Person Woman Man Camera TV: A Cognitively Adequate Ale
items.desc:
Friends & Family & Beer is more than a not-for-profit festival — it’s a wider celebration of community, creativity and independent values. To emphasise this, we’re brewing a series of collaborations with our friends, and donating 5% of profits from each to charity. For the third, we’ve taken old favourite Make Apple Pie Great Again and made it greater. Brewed with Against The Grain, this full-flavoured Brown Ale is infused with apple, cinnamon, nutmeg, allspice and vanilla. Just like mom used to make.
8.0% ABV 440ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Right Leg
items.desc:
An IPA hopped with Motueka, Loral and Chinook, Fermented with a modern New England yeast strain.
ALC 6.0% VOL 440ML
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: That Which You Earn/Yearn For 4 Pack
items.desc:
Join us in a side-by-side experiment focused on our delicious hops.
These two beers are almost identical but have one subtle difference. One is hopped with standard Mosaic, and one with an organic variant of the hop.
This pack includes the following four beers:
2 x That Which You Yearn For, 6% - Organic Mosaic single-hopped IPA (440ml can)
2 x That Which You Earn For, 6% - Mosaic single-hopped IPA (440ml can)
6% ABV 440ML x 4
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS
**THIS PACK IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR DISCOUNTS AS IT'S ALREADY DISCOUNTED**

items.name: That Which You Yearn For
items.desc:
The green, open spaces we yearn for, where nature takes its course, and human intervention is low and humble, have been reduced by agribusiness to premium offerings. The organic Mosaic hops in this IPA are handled as we imagine all hops are handled, treated as we imagine all hops are treated.
Single Hopped Organic Mosaic IPA.
6% ABV 440ML
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: The Beauty Between Power And Dreams
items.desc:
Bold, modern DIPA meets classic Hefeweizen. Featuring our delicious, hand-selected Simcoe and Amarillo hops, blending mouthwatering citrus flavours with prominent notes of banana and bubblegum, rounded off with pepper and clove on the finish. It's deep, creamy and totally indulgent while remaining seriously drinkable.
8.5% ABV 440ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS
